item.title: MobiLogLeak: A Preliminary Study on Data Leakage Caused by Poor Logging Practices
item.description: This work was done with my supervisor Wahab Hamou-Lhadj in collaboration with Dr. Mohammad Hamdaqa and Dr. Haipeng Cai.
